description:
A Library for WPF with Navigation, UI Composition and helpers for Mvvm Pattern. 

Navigation 
View To View 
View To ViewModel 
ViewModel To ViewModel 
And UI composition with regions and history. 

Mvvm 
ServiceLocator (BCL) : Easy IoC container. Implementing IServiceLocator (Microsoft.Practices.ServiceLocation) . 
Messenger (BCL) : with token, callback, etc. 
Commands and composite command. 
ViewModelBase : the base class for ViewModels. Implementing navigation. 
Observables (notification, cancellation and validation) 
Etc.
releaseNotes:
A big update of EasyLocator (IoC Container). 
EasyLocator is an easy IoC Container that implements IServiceLocator(Microsoft.Practices.ServiceLocation http://commonservicelocator.codeplex.com/).It allows you to register Services and instances.
Named registering : You can also name them if you want to store several instances of a type or retrieve them easily by name.
Caching Strategy : You get new instances every time you try to get one. You can also keep alive instances and cache them.
title: Wpf Like WinRT
